name: Dorit Aharonov
content: Dorit Aharonov Professor, Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Hebrew University, Jerusalem, Israel. Contact Information: E-mail: doria@cs.huji.ac.il Office: Ross Building #72, Givat Ram Office Phone number: 972-2-658-4611 Research: Research Interests: Quantum computational complexity, Quantum algorithms, Quantum cryptographic protocols. The transition from quantum to classical physics. The notion of entanglement, and how it can be better understood via the study of quantum complexity Quantum Hamiltonian complexity and connections to condensed matter physics Connections between quantum computation and various other complexity topics such as Markov chains, lattices, and more. Thesis (Hebrew Univ., 1999) Papers Media Here is a one minute trailer for the movie The Quantum Tamers a documentary movie on quantum information science, 2009 (I am participating for a full 120 seconds I think...) Harnessing Quantum Physics An hour long Canadian TV program about quantum computation filmed in 2009 at the Perimeter Institute, featuring Ignacio Cirac, Daniel Gottesman, Peter Shor, Avi Wigderson, and myself, with Mike Mosca as the host. a Nature article from 2005 in which I appear too.
